main event: An unidentified flying object with a flame-colored tail was observed traveling slowly over Hemet, California on 2 November 1957.
interesting points: The object measured approximately 4 feet long and 1 Â½ feet wide,The tail had a distinct flame color visible,The object's flight path was westward,Observation was made by a civilian,Insufficient data led to inconclusive evaluation about the object's nature.
